articles.title: Sony's new SLR camera quadruples shooting speed with global shutter - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Advanced sensor technology helps Alpha 9 III take aim at pros
articles.content: TOKYO -- Sony will roll out a new mirrorless single-lens reflex camera next year capable of taking 120 shots per second with automatic focusing, catering to professional photographers who need to cap… [+220 chars]
